# TX Decoder

The TX Decoder application for decoding transaction data.

## Local Development

### Running the app

```
pnpm run dev
```

Or from the app directory:

```
pnpm dev
```

## Sample Inputs

Use these `unsigned_transaction_serialized` examples to test the decoder. Copy any payload into the transaction textarea and switch between summary or JSON views to explore the result.

### Solana delegate

```text

```

### Cardano delegate

```text

```

```text

```
